entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Perf][Mono][Interpreter] Regression in Call Benchmarks #63029
  • Vector256.Create() doesn't document that it corresponds to _mm256_setr_epiN (set reverse) #63019
  • Filter TPL events on synchronous TaskWaitBegin #63016
  • [HTTP/3] test failure: Public_Interop_ExactVersion_BufferContent_Success fails with CONNECTION_IDLE #63009
  • EventSource_SuccessfulHandshake_LogsStartStop failures on Windows11 #63008
  • Channel<T>.Reader.ReadAllAsync() may make memory leak #63006
  • Suboptimal field layout when an object is wrapped in a struct #63005
  • Test failure readytorun\\crossgen2\\crossgen2smoke\\crossgen2smoke.cmd #63004
  • Test failure Interop\\StringMarshalling\\VBByRefStr\\VBByRefStrTest\\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #63003

Closed

  • Possible typo: "This method is intended for compiler user..." #62248
    Future
  • Static abstract methods missing during runtime #62920
    7.0.0
  • [Uri] LocalPath shouldn't encode unicode chars #62946
  • Assertion failed '(tree->gtFlags & GTF_GLOB_REF) || ((obj != nullptr) && (obj->gtOper == GT_LCL_VAR))' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' (IL size 36) #62815
  • JsonSerializer.SerializeToElement has wrong XML documentation #62993
    7.0.0
  • JsonIgnore in record declaration #62961
  • .net 6 blazor can't publish #62332
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Make test System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 more robust #63028
    area-System.Data, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Override same attributes found at class and property level in ApplicationSettingsBase #63025
    area-System.Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Delete some null checks #63024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary assignment of a value to local variables in SPC #63020
    area-System.Runtime
  • More static in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #63017
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 18.04 and dotnet-buildtools-prereq docker images for enterprise linux pipeline #63014
    area-System.Net
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution

Merged

  • Various WASM AOT changes #62997
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixed typo in remarks section of OnCompleted #62982
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Fix for a rare race condition in System.IO.Packaging #63013
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve XML documentation #62994
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix managed CoreCLR build on Android #63002
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1521917 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AppContext.SetData in ref assembly #62996
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62914
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Move coreclr specific ComponentActivator hosting dependency to coreclr #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono
  • Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #62989
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi.py: Detect changes in jiteeversionguid.h #63000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-inc,gc, ToolBox directory. #62886
    community-contribution
